Text: Your WHOS WHO Nomination MARK This email message may be a recurring mailing If you would like to be removed from our email announcement list click on the link below You may need to copy and paste the link into your browserclick below removeunsubscribehtml Dear MARK On behalf of the WHOS WHO Historical Society I am pleased to inform you that you have been selected as a possible candidate for the edition of International WHOS WHO of Professionals This is the definitive work on the worlds leaders in commerce economics policy and trade In todays difficult economy admission to a powerful network of professionals can be a career lifeline We do require additional information and ask that you complete the data form via the Internet at faxhtm There is no fee associated with your listing in WHOS WHO and we do not distribute member information for resale Our goal is to provide reference information and a networking forum for world leaders Nomination to WHOS WHO is an honor in itself The Society was founded in and provides the most comprehensive listing of professionals whose contributions shape and direct the destiny of nations Our unabbreviated biographies of the most successful professionals from countries are housed in private libraries and collections around the world Current members who grace our pages include leading business executives heads of state noted academics and other professionals Our editorial deadline is quickly approaching I urge you to act today If you delay I cannot guarantee the committee will have ample time to review your submission Sincerely Terrence J Leifheit Executive Director PS Please be sure to fill in the fax and email sections so we can get proofs of your biographical writeup to you quickly if you are selected for inclusion
